commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
# Example Environment Variables for MapIt Project
# Copy this file to .env and update with your actual values

# ==========================================
# Database Connection Configuration
# ==========================================

# Database server details
DB_HOST=127.0.0.1
DB_PORT=5432
DB_NAME=mapit
DB_USER=postgres
DB_PASSWORD=YourStrongPasswordHere

# Full connection string (alternative to individual params)
DATABASE_URL=postgres://postgres:YourStrongPasswordHere@localhost:5432/mapit

# ==========================================
# PostgREST Configuration
# ==========================================

# PostgREST server settings
POSTGREST_HOST=127.0.0.1
POSTGREST_PORT=3100
POSTGREST_DB_URI=postgres://postgres:YourStrongPasswordHere@localhost:5432/mapit
POSTGREST_DB_SCHEMAS=public
POSTGREST_DB_ANON_ROLE=anon

# ==========================================
# CORS Settings
# ==========================================

# Allowed origins (comma-separated, no spaces)
CORS_ORIGINS=http://localhost:8080,http://127.0.0.1:8080,http://localhost:5173,http://127.0.0.1:5173
CORS_MAX_AGE=86400

# ==========================================
# API Configuration
# ==========================================

# API base URL for frontend
API_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3100

# Server port (optional, defaults to 3101)
PORT=3101

# ==========================================
# Instructions
# ==========================================
#
# 1. Copy this file to .env:
#    cp .env.example .env
#
# 2. Update DB_PASSWORD with your actual PostgreSQL password
#
# 3. Update DATABASE_URL and POSTGREST_DB_URI with the same password
#
# 4. Test your configuration:
#    npm run db:test
#
# 5. Start your server:
#    npm run server:check
#
# ==========================================
